game_description: Are you ready for an epic snowball fight? Red team VS. Blue team, up to 4v4 multiplayer. Join a public room for a quick match with random players, or create a private room to play with your friends. Pick up loots to recharge energy, or get a shield or a snowball toy gun! This game will be brought by Santa Clause on the night of Dec 24th and will be available for FREE DURING THE HOLIDAYS!
review_3: I really like this game. It's quick, fun and still has some room for tactics.
review_4: Fun little snowballing multiplayer game from the talented devs that brought us Black Hole Pool.
review_5: you can play public and private game. blue team versus red team. snowball fight with loots
